quote_first: Apparently the great Percy has no sense of humour, for at
quote_last: he got tired of it, and hit Skinner crisply in the right eyeball, blacking the same as per illustration.
title: A Prefect's Uncle
author: P.G. Wodehouse

quote_first: In the next instant she was running toward her house, unmindful of the bags she had dropped, seeing only the police cars, knowing as she glanced down at her watch and saw that it was
quote_last: , that for her time had stopped.
title: Life Penalty
author: Joy Fielding
